body:
Comment 2: 
Thank you, I have been able to reproduce the issue. As a workaround, if you only include
the pkgs you need in your appengine project root, rather than the whole go.crypto tree,
this will fix the issue.

I'm going to move this to thinking state as the question of app engine compatibilty for
pkg writers probably needs to be raised.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
